description: Born. Didn't do much that year.
Learned how to ride a bike; still have that bike to this day.
Spent every summer at the country house working, learning work ethic and hard work.
Learned English just by watching cartoons and TV shows.
Joined a debate club and an after-school programming club.
Began my journey in web development and started offering my services to clients.
Started running and completed my first half marathon.
Joined Accenture as a frontend developer.
Temporarily transitioned to a full-stack development role.
Started helping people online with programming.
Went on a long road trip to Spain. What a trip!
Picked up a new hobby: disc golf. It's a lot of fun!
